marytts.unitselection.select
Class Target

java.lang.Object
  marytts.unitselection.select.Target
Direct Known Subclasses:
DiphoneTarget, HalfPhoneTarget
public class Target
extends java.lang.Object

A representation of a target representing the ideal properties of a unit in a target utterance.

Author:
Marc Schröder

Constructor Detail

Target

public Target(java.lang.String name,
              org.w3c.dom.Element maryxmlElement)
Create a target associated to the given element in the MaryXML tree.

Parameters:
name - a name for the target, which may or may not coincide with the segment name.
maryxmlElement - the phone or boundary element in the MaryXML tree to be associated with this target.
